DeletedStoredNotApplied: Stored and Deleted but not yet applied
ErrorNotSameType: Attributes have not the same type
ErrorParentSideProductENG: Parent mapping type is mapped with mapping Product to ENG, only this direction is possible
ErrorParentSideENGProduct: Parent mapping type is mapped with mapping ENG to Product, only this direction is possible
ErrorProductAlreadyUsedAsSource: Product Object already used as source in mapping
ErrorPartAlreadyUsedAsSource: Part Object already used as source in mapping
ErrorProductAlreadyUsedAsTarget: Product Object already used as target
ErrorPartAlreadyUsedAsTarget: Part Object already used as target
ErrorProductAlreadyUsedAsTargetWithAnoth: Product Object is already used as target with another Part objects in mapping :
ErrorPartAlreadyUsedAsSourceWithAnotherO: Part Object is already used as source with another Product objects in mapping :
ErrorProductAlreadyUsedAsSourceWithAnoth: Product Object is used as source with another Part objects in mapping :
ErrorPartAlreadyUsedAsTargetWithAnotherO: Part Object is used as target with another Product objects in mapping :
ErrorVPMOnlyUsedAsSource: Product attribute is only available as source
ErrorMxOnlyUsedAsSource: Part attribute is only available as source
InvalidMapping: Invalid Mappings exist, please solve the problems before deploying
ErrorNotDeployed: Product or Part attribute is not deployed, modifying attribute is not possible
ErrorNoAuthorizedAttribute: Product or Part attribute is not authorized, mapping should be removed
errorReviveMappingAlreadyMapped: attributes are mapped together in another mapping.
errorReviveMappingPartUsedAsTarget: Part attribute is used as target in another mapping.
errorReviveMappingPrdUsedAsTarget: Product attribute is used as target in another mapping.
errorReviveMappingPrdAndPrtUsedAsTarget: Product and Part attributes are used as target in another mapping.
errorReviveMapping: Restore this mapping is not possible.
PrdUsedAsTargetReason: Product attribute already used as target and
PrdReadOnlyReason: Product attribute already used as target and
RangeIncompatibilyAndPrtReadOnlyReason: Part attribute is not available as target and range incompatibility
RangeIncompatibilyAndPrtAlreadyUsedReaso: Part attribute is already used as target and range incompatibility
PrtReadOnlyReason: Part attributes is not available as target
PrtUsedAsTargetReason: Part attributes is already used as target
ErrorProductUnknown: Product attribute private or doesn't exists
ErrorPartUnknown: Part attribute private or doesn't exists
